title: Ep215 Crimes that Inspired Songs
description:
This week, the gals warm up their pipes to bring you a couple of top hits that come from shockingly gruesome cases. Topics include a culpable captive, the surprising sensitivity of Hanson, and one of the most prolific killers in the US. Pop open a bottle of Winc's Wall of Sound Red Blend, get ready for a whole bunch of ear worms (eew), and tune in for Crimes That Inspired Songs.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
